ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t forget that they can duel wield a 2hs weapon and a shield...and maybe 2 2hs weapons (2 exe axes...ouch) Taluvil ... From: Talies the Wanderer
ygData.messageBody:
Don't forget that they can duel wield a 2hs weapon and a shield...and maybe
2 2hs weapons (2 exe axes...ouch)

Taluvil
----- Original Message -----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 2:42 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.


> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 11:32 AM 11/23/99 -0600, you wrote:
> >From: silky@...
> >
> >
> >Is it just me - or are some of the things NPCs allowed to do that we
can't
> >just really out of wack?
> >
> >Seemingly endless manna
> >Seemingly limitless casting range
> >Able to affect folks WELL outside normal range limits
> >Able to have multiple pets
> >
> >Lets see - anything I've forgotten?
>
> First, it's not seemingly - it *is* limitless mana. A guide friend of
mine
> confirmed that one...
> And a few additions to your list:
> Can cast while moving, Can open locked doors, can see through walls, can
> attack from the bottom of the ocean, don't drown - ever, can chase you
even
> when blinded....
>
> And the list goes on....
>
> Talies
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
